DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate use hemostatic gelatine-thrombin matrix athermal nerve-sparing prostate resection compare conventional hemostasis use electrocautery patient localized prostate cancer investigate effect postoperative erectile function continence .
DOC.brief_title: Athermal Nerve-sparing During Robotic-assisted Radical Prostatectomy Using Hemostatic Matrix .
DOC.criteria: Patient age > 18 Histologically proven prostate cancer ( Gleason < 8 ; PSA < 10ng/ml ) Disease confine prostate clinical examination Preoperative IEEF5Score > 20 Patient able give inform consent ASA IVV Prior extensive abdominal surgery Signs metastatic disease Known allergy bovine material Patient unable give inform consent
